title.rendered: Work Gloves for Men and Women, 8-Pack, Nitrile Coated Safety Gloves Firm Grip

content.rendered:
• 【 Tough Gloves for Work 】Utowels brand work gloves are 1.7 oz/per pair ( 48.2 gram/per pair ) well made, long lasting for extra duty work. Up to 3 times more durable than average leather work gloves
  • 【 Easy Care Washable 】Breathable strong nylon knit shell and flexible rubberized coating are machine or hand washable, fast drying and reusable
  • 【 Comfort Hold Grip 】Work glove with nitrile rubber non-slip coating has strong gripping power for working in wet, dry and oily job environments
  • 【 Punture Resistant 】Palm and finger coated work gloves provide flexible dexterity along with nail needle thorn proof and abrasion cut resistance
  • 【 Multi Applications 】General purpose, assembly, car repair, warehouse logistics, home improvement, gardening yard work, cleaning and construction
  • 【 Textured Nitrile Palm Coating 】Smooth, strong, liquid-resistant and excellent for gripping. The seamless knit shell provides a comfortable, tight fit and the elastic wrist keeps out dirt and debris while you work.

excerpt.rendered: Utowels brand work gloves are 1.7 oz/per pair ( 48.2 gram/per pair ) well made, long lasting for extra duty work. Up to 3 times more durable than average leather work gloves
